resources.string: This application helps you to enhance your programming and algorithemic knowledge. Start learning today and see where ProgrammingTeacher can take you.
You going to learn programming with Programming teacher.

*. You have to write pseudo code for solution. 

 	*. We are not aim any specific programming language. But we suppose you get clear idea about pseudo codes. In gaming area this you may use following functions and variables.


 	1. myScore - your current possition in the game board.

 	2. isPrime(n) - check wether given parameter is prime or not.

 	3. s.upper() - Converts given string(s) to upper case

 	4. input() - get ab input from user

 	5. modulo - the modulo operation finds the remainder after division of one number by another
	Usege : a modulo b

 	6. function - to declare a function 

 	7. devide(a,b) - returns answer after a devide by b 

 	8. setMyScore(n) - set your score/position to n
Click “Take me to the quiz” to begin the game.
You will see your first question here.
Optional keywords are on your left and compulsory keywords are on your left.
Next question will appear once you correctly finished first question.
Arrange the answer to the question by clicking on keywords.
Click “Undo action ” to reset your selections. Click “Check answer” once you finished. You can use the “Game board icon to view your position”.
